Crescent_Betyl.lore: Meteoric black stone shard; hums near Va-Pylons.
Crescent_Betyl.notes: Reclaimer surveyors and Khilafate priests covet these.

Pylon_Tuning_Key.lore: Geometric brass rod etched with Eldran ratios.
effects: Retune an active pylon once; on success, lower local Veil Pressure by 1; on fail, spawn Betyl Warden

Seal_Brand.lore: Dwarf brand heated in soul-forges; marks flesh with anti-Veil runes.
effects: Apply ‘Seal Scar’: bearer gains +10 Veil resistance; −1 max stamina tier
